title: Week 7 Recap: The Seahawks Can’t Play Normal Games, Brady’s and Belichick’s Future, and Winners and Losers | The Ringer NFL Show
description:
Kevin and Nora start by reacting to the ‘Sunday Night Football’ thriller in which the Arizona Cardinals defeated the Seattle Seahawks in overtime. Then they discuss what the future holds for the Tom Brady–led Tampa Bay Buccaneers and for Bill Belichick and the New England Patriots. They then give their Week 7 winners and losers, answer some listener questions, and pick their clickbait headline of the week.
Hosts: Kevin Clark and Nora Princiotti
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
